name: latest_tweets
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool crypto_news_v3.
Tool description: Get the latest crypto news incl. sentiment analysis and keyword extraction
API description: This endpoint provides the latest crypto news tweets incl. sentiment analysis ([textblob](https://textblob.readthedocs.io/en/dev/quickstart.html)) and keyword extraction ([Yake](http://yake.inesctec.pt/)). 

Parameters:
- **[OPTIONAL] last_n_hours**: Only tweets from the last *n* hours are provided (default: 12).
- **[OPTIONAL] max_articles**: Maximum number of tweets in response (default:100, max:100)
- **[OPTIONAL] top_n_keywords**: Number of keywords to extract form tweet (default:10)

Currently, we make

top_n_keywords.description: The number of keywords to extract from each tweet. Default is 10.

max_tweets.description: Maximum number of tweets in response (default:100, max:100)

last_n_hours.description: Parameter to get crypto tweets for the last *n* hours (default: 12)
